verses.1: David sung panin Hebron ah a piang tapate: Jezreel mi Ahinoam tawh a neih a tacil Amnon, Karmel numei Abigail tawh a neih a nihna Daniel,
verses.2: Geshur kumpipa Talmaiʼ tanu, a nu Maakah ahi a thumna Absalom, a nu Haggith ahi a lina Adonijah,
verses.3: Abital tawh a neih a ngana Shefatiah, a zi Eglah tawh a neih a gukna Ithream hi a,
verses.4: amah in kum sagih le kha guk sung a ukna Hebron ah ama sung panin guk suak hi. Tua ciangin amah in Jerusalem ah kum sawm thum le thum sung uk hi.
verses.5: Ama sung panin Jerusalem ah a suakte: Shimea, Shobab, Nathan le Solomon hi a, Ammielʼ tanu Bathsheba tawh a neih li pha hi.
verses.8: Elishama, Eliada le Elifelet, kua pha uh hi.
verses.9: Hihte pen a zineuteʼ tapate sim loin, Davidʼ tapate ahi hi. Tamar a kici tanu khat zong amah in nei lai hi.
verses.10: Solomonʼ suanlekhakte: Rehoboam, a tapa Abijah, a tapa Asa, a tapa Jehoshafat,
verses.11: a tapa Joram, a tapa Ahaziah, a tapa Joash,
verses.12: a tapa Amaziah, a tapa Azariah, a tapa Jotham,
verses.13: a tapa Ahaz, a tapa Hezekiah, a tapa Manasseh,
verses.14: a tapa Amon, a tapa Josiah ahi uh hi.
verses.15: Josiahʼ tapate: A tacil Johanan, a nihna Jehoiakim, a thumna Zedekiah, a lina Shallum ahi uh hi.
verses.16: Jehoiakimʼ suanlekhakte: A tapa Jehoiakhin le Zedekiah ahi uh hi.
verses.17: Babylon ah sal a suak Jehoiakhinʼ tapate: A tapa Shealtiel,
verses.18: Makhiram, Pedaiah, Shenazzar, Jekamiah, Hoshama le Nedabiah ahi uh hi.
verses.19: Pedaiahʼ tapate: Zerubbabel le Shimei ahi uh hi. Zerubbabelʼ tapate: Meshullam le Hananiah hi a, Shelomith kici tanu khat zong nei hi.
verses.20: Tua ciangin tapa dang Hashubah, Ohel, Berekhiah, Hasadiah le Jushab-hesed, nga nei lai hi.
verses.21: Hananiahʼ tapate: Pelatiah le Jeshaiah hi a, Jeshaiahʼ ta Refaiah, a tapa Arnan, a tapa Obadiah, a tapa Shekaniah ahi uh hi.
verses.22: Shekaniah in tapa khat le tupa nga nei a, a tapa Shemaiah ahi hi. Shemaiah tapate: Hattush, Igal, Bariah, Neariah le Shafat ahi uh hi.
verses.23: Neariahʼ tapate: Elioenai, Hizkiah le Azrikam, thum pha uh hi.
verses.24: Elioenaiʼ tapate: Hodaviah, Eliashib, Pelaiah, Akkub, Johanan, Delaiah le Anani, sagih pha uh hi.
